data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 4, Dijon have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
In the minute 6, Dijon will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Strasbourg.
Strasbourg's Kenny Lala misses with an attempt on goal.
Florent Batta awards Dijon a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Florent Batta signals a Dijon throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Alexander Djiku's header is off-target for Strasbourg.
In the minute 9, Dijon have a goal kick.
Throw-in Dijon.
Free kick Strasbourg.
In the minute 10, Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Strasbourg have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Dijon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 13, Strasbourg's Ludovic Ajorque has been booked in Strasbourg.
Free kick for Dijon in the half of Strasbourg.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Dijon.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 18, Free kick for Dijon in their own half.
Can Strasbourg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Dijon's half?
Important block from the Dijon defence as Adrien Thomasson fires in a strike for Strasbourg.
In the minute 20, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Mohamed Simakan gets his shot on target but fails to score for Strasbourg.
In the minute 23, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 25, Can Strasbourg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Mohamed Simakan (Strasbourg) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
In the minute 27, Florent Batta signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
Can Strasbourg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Dijon's half?
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Dijon.
In the minute 30, Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Dijon at Stade de la Meinau.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Strasbourg in Strasbourg.
Frederic Sammaritano (Dijon) gets a yellow card.
Strasbourg are coming forward and Jeanricner Bellegarde gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Dijon at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in their own half.
Dijon drive upfield and Eric Ebimbe gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Strasbourg defender.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
In Strasbourg Dijon attack through Chafik. The finish is off target, however.
Florent Batta awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
In the minute 40, Strasbourg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Florent Batta awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, Florent Batta signals a Dijon throw-in in Strasbourg's half.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Strasbourg.
Florent Batta blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 47, Dijon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Dijon at Stade de la Meinau.
Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Dijon.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
Florent Batta signals a throw-in for Dijon, close to Strasbourg's area.
In the minute 58, Dijon's Eric Ebimbe is on target but unsuccessful.
Strasbourg make their first substitution with Dimitri Lienard replacing Jeanricner Bellegarde.
Strasbourg are caught offside.
Florent Batta signals a Strasbourg throw-in in Dijon's half.
In the minute 60, Lionel Carole is on a sub for Anthony Caci for Strasbourg.
Stephane Jobard (Dijon) is making a first substitution, with Mounir Chouiar replacing Frederic Sammaritano.
In the minute 61, Free kick Strasbourg.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Strasbourg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 63, Ball goes out of play for a Dijon goal kick.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Strasbourg.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Strasbourg to check on Eric Ebimbe, who is grimacing with pain.
Florent Batta awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 65, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Lionel Carole.
Eric Ebimbe has recovered and rejoins the match in Strasbourg.
Lionel Carole for Strasbourg is back on the field again.
In the minute 66, The away team has substituted Eric Ebimbe with Wesley Lautoa. Stephane Jobard is thus making his second change.
Can Dijon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Strasbourg's half?
In the minute 68, Corner awarded to Dijon.
Free kick for Strasbourg in their own half.
The home team have replaced Majeed Waris with Mehdi Chahiri. This is the third substitution made today by Thierry Laurey.
In the minute 69, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Strasbourg's Alexander Djiku attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Dijon have a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Strasbourg in the half of Dijon.
Alexander Djiku (Strasbourg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 71, Adrien Thomasson (Strasbourg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Dijon needs to be cautious. Strasbourg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Florent Batta signals a free kick to Dijon in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Strasbourg.
In the minute 76, Dijon are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Strasbourg to take a throw-in in Dijon territory.
Thierry Laurey is making the team's fourth substitution at Stade de la Meinau with Idriss Saadi replacing Adrien Thomasson.
Idriss Saadi heads the ball against the upright! Almost a goal there for Strasbourg.
Strasbourg advance rapidly upfield but Florent Batta blows for offside.
In the minute 78, Sanjin Prcic is replacing Alexander Djiku for Strasbourg at Stade de la Meinau.
Corner awarded to Strasbourg.
In the minute 80, Stefan Mitrovic scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
Dimitri Lienard instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Dijon.
Throw-in for Dijon in their own half.
In the minute 85, Strasbourg have been awarded a corner by Florent Batta.
Dijon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rayan Philippe for Dijon drives towards goal at Stade de la Meinau. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The away team replace Jordan Marie with Wilitty Younoussa.
In the minute 86, Rayan Philippe is replacing Bersant Celina for the away team.
So close for Strasbourg as Sanjin Prcic's shot comes back off the post.
In the minute 89, In Strasbourg Strasbourg drive forward through Idriss Saadi. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Strasbourg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Dijon's Wesley Lautoa breaks free at Stade de la Meinau. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Florent Batta awards Strasbourg a goal kick.
Throw-in for Strasbourg close to the penalty box.
Strasbourg push upfield but Florent Batta quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick for Strasbourg in the half of Dijon.
The match has come to a close in Strasbourg. The final score is 1-0.
